channel.title: Map Redesign,Font Change. Rep++
channel.description:
Is there anyway to redesign the map so that it looks different to how it normally does, possibly so you can move it from it's set position or change the shape of how it appears.
And is there a way to change the font of all the text on the game if so how and where?
Grateful of any replies thank you.
